snippet: Apple’s new iOS 6 software makes it easy to back up to iCloud, the data backup service. That can become costly unless a user is selective in what is saved.
abstract: Tool Kit column; Apple’s new iOS 6 software upgrade for iPhone and iPad makes it easy to back up to data backup service iCloud, which can become costly if user is not selective in what is saved.
lead_paragraph: Apple’s new iOS 6 software makes it easy to back up to iCloud, the data backup service. That can become costly unless a user is selective in what is saved.

headline.seo: Make Better Use of Backup in Apple’s iCloud - Tool Kit
headline.main: Making Room in Your Piece of the Cloud
headline.print_headline: Making Room in Your Piece of the Cloud
